Comments_List: I learnt a lot about Native Americans and indigenous lifeways.
Beautiful texts and thoughtful discussions. Loved being a part of it.
Directly in line with my expectations - explanations were set up well.

Too many generalizations were made, and I often felt misunderstood in class discussions

Student discussion questions often felt irrelevant or completely disconnected from the readings
Students who want to know something about indigenous ways of thinking, Native Americans and even interdependence between man and nature should take this course.
